info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern McDowell, east central Mitchell, Caldwell, southern Avery and northwestern Burke Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Lenoir, or 8 miles north of Table Rock, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Morganton, Spruce Pine, Gamewell, Cajah`s Mountain, Drexel, Cedar Rock, Crossnore, Linville Falls and B.R. Parkway-Linville Falls To Grandfather. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
